citation: Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022 (Tas)
text:
Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022

An Act to amend the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 and the Traffic Act 1925
[Royal Assent 10 November 2022]

Be it enacted by Her Excellency the Governor of Tasmania, by and with the advice and consent of the Legislative Council and House of Assembly, in Parliament assembled, as follows:

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This Act may be cited as the Vehicle and Traffic Amendment (Driver Distraction and Speed Enforcement) Act 2022 .

2. Commencement
    This Act commences on a day to be proclaimed.

PART 2 - Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

7.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Vehicle and Traffic Act 1999 .

11.

12.

PART 3 - Traffic Act 1925 Amended

13.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic Act 1925 .

14.

15.

16.

17.

18.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic Act 1925 .

19.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Traffic Act 1925 .

PART 4 - Miscellaneous

20. Repeal of Act
    This Act is repealed on the first anniversary of the day on which this Act commenced.
